1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Matt Times is a history teacher searching for answers on how to keep his kids focused on his lessons. Angela Smoothly, the science teacher, tries to seduce Matt but unintentionally gives him the idea to dress up as Abraham Lincoln. The tough P.E teacher Ken lets Times practice becoming Lincoln. Times feels a whole new confidence until he sees Superintendent Powers observing his class. His nervousness has him lose control of his body. Powers makes fun of Times which snaps Matt from his weak history teacher persona and into the legendary Abe Lincoln.
imdb.title: Teachers Lounge
